result.translation: When the earth is shaken with a mighty quake,
and the earth throws out its burdens[1],
result.footnotes: [1] i.e., its dead bodies and treasures.

result.translation: and man says[2], “What is the matter with it?”
On that Day it will recount all its news,
because your Lord has inspired it [to do so].

result.arabic_text: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
result.translation: On that Day all people will come forward in separate groups to be shown their deeds[3].
result.footnotes:
[3] From the place of Judgment to see the consequences of their deeds, whether to Paradise or to Hell.
 [MMCXIII]

result.arabic_text: فَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيۡرٗا يَرَهُۥ
result.translation: So whoever does an atom’s weight[4] of good will see it,

result.arabic_text: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ
result.translation: and whoever does an atom’s weight of evil will see it.
